game.name: Rescue Heli
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In this arcade style simulation game, be the pilot of a life saving helicopter and a member of a life saving crew. Whenever lives are in danger you will make a difference by ensuring that the help is there.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this arcade style simulation game, be the pilot of a life saving helicopter and a member of a life saving crew. Whenever lives are in danger you will make a difference by ensuring that the help is there.
